    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Address_Detail

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Address_Summary
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Address_Detail

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<AddressDetail language="en" role="Home" validInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <AddressLine>111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland</AddressLine>
    <BldgRoom buldingInd="true">Bldg H</BldgRoom>
    <Number pO_Box="98567499" ruralRouteNmbr="88" streetDirection="NNW" streetNmbrSuffix="B">563</Number>
    <Street>Travers Street</Street>
    <City>Dublin</City>
    <County>Fairfax</County>
    <StateProv name="Texas">TX</StateProv>
    <Country name="Ireland">IR</Country>
    <PostalCode>32165-9999</PostalCode>
    <Remark>This address should be used for all official correspondences.</Remark>
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    <Type>Business</Type>
    <Use>Billing</Use>
</AddressDetail>

      Example JSON

      {
  "AddressDetail" : {
    "role" : "Home",
    "language" : "en",
    "validInd" : true,
    "AddressLine" : [ "111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland" ],
    "BldgRoom" : [ {
      "value" : "Bldg H",
      "buldingInd" : true
    } ],
    "Number" : {
      "value" : "563",
      "streetNmbrSuffix" : "B",
      "streetDirection" : "NNW",
      "ruralRouteNmbr" : "88",
      "pO_Box" : "98567499"
    },
    "Street" : "Travers Street",
    "City" : "Dublin",
    "County" : "Fairfax",
    "StateProv" : {
      "value" : "TX",
      "name" : "Texas"
    },
    "Country" : {
      "value" : "IR",
      "name" : "Ireland"
    },
    "PostalCode" : "32165-9999",
    "Remark" : "This address should be used for all official correspondences.",
    "Privacy" : {
      "value" : null,
      "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
      "shareSyncInd" : "No",
      "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
      "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
      "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00"
    },
    "Type" : {
      "value" : "Business"
    },
    "Use" : {
      "value" : "Billing"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Remark
        A remark associated with this address.
        Details
        Type StringText
        Example Value This address should be used for all official correspondences.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Privacy
        Allows for control of the sharing of address information between parties.
        Details
        Type Privacy
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Type
        Defines the type of address (e.g. home, business, other). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Communication Location Type (CLT).
        Details
        Type CommunicationLocation_Enum
        Example Value Business
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Use
        Describes the use of the address (e.g. mailing, delivery, billing, etc.). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Address Use Type (AUT).
        Details
        Type AddressUse_Enum
        Example Value Billing
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Properties inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Address_Summary

        AddressLine, BldgRoom, Number, Street, City, County, StateProv, Country, PostalCode

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        language
        Example: en
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:language
        Example Value en
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        validInd
        If true, this is a valid and complete mailing address that has been verified through an address verification service or previously mailed materials have not been returned.
